oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Boling Amusement Company Job No. 37009
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Hatch Show Print (Firm);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Invoice (No. 1570) for an order placed by the Boling Amusement Company for 150 two color jumbos and 100 pictorial window cards for the Taylor County Fair and Horse Show on July 12-17. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.
